portfolio.title: Creator
portfolio.description:
Full stack Application where a user can view clothes, add to cart and make a purchase
Admin user for product creation, inventory updating and pricing
The back-end was built using Mongoose and MongoDB for data storage. Firebase for Auth Authentication
The front-end was built using React, Redux and Ant Design for styling
Npm packages stripe, type-writer, image-resizer and modal-image
portfolio.techStack: React | Redux | MongoDB | Cloudinary Api | Firebase
